dmca.title: DMCA - cretetravel
dmca.body:
THE CreteTravel.com GROUP
SuperbGreece.com 
CreteTravel.com 
CreteHotelsRooms.com 
CreteCarRental.com 
SuperbWorld
Monaho
73003 Armenoi 
Crete, GREECE
Tel.: (+30) 28250 32690
Fax: (+30) 28250 32693
reservations@cretetravel.com

Date: 21/2/2007
To: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
About: DMCA Notice re: pancar.gr (83.138.174.244)
Via fax: 001-650-963-3255
Pages: 2

Dear Google Legal Team,

I would like to notify you of the following copyright infringement:

1. The copyrighted work at issue is our article "Driving in Crete" at http://www.cretetravel.com/Driving_in_Crete.htm

2. The infringing material is included on page: http://www.pancar.gr/kriti_en.html (under heading "Driving in Crete...")

3.Search Queries: "driving in crete",
"crete driving car",
"roads in crete",
"crete average driving times"
Infringing web page: http://www.pancar.gr/kriti_en.html

4. Our contact information is:
The CreteTravel.com Group
Tel: (+30) 28250 32690
Fax: (+30) 28250 32693
Address: Monaho, 73003 Armenoi Chanion, Crete, Greece
email: legal@cretetravel.com

5. The contact information for PANCAR.GR:
Tel: +30 28210 68124, 38024
Fax: +30 28210 68134, 28298
E-mail: info@pancar.gr

6. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

7. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

I would like to add:
- We have messaged this company on the 7th of February 2007 and again on the 14th of February about the infringement and have asked for the removal of the copyrighted material.
- They have not responded in any way.

I appreciate very much your expedient action to remove access to this infringing material.

Sincerely,
Roger Ellman
CEO - CreteTravel.com
-------------------
The CreteTravel.com Group

- Tel: (+30) 28250 32690
- Fax: (+30) 28250 32693

Address: Monaho, 73003 Armenoi Chanion, Crete, Greece
email: legal@cretetravel.com
